definition-item.definition-title: LABELLING OR TAGGING MACHINES, APPARATUS, OR PROCESSES (nailing or stapling in general B25C, B27F; applying labels for packaging purposes B65B; labels, name-plates G09F ){(series-printing machines B41L; containers for the storage or transport of packages B65D)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Labelling flat essentially rigid surfaces.
Labelling other than flat surfaces, such as bottles, cables or wire.
Labelling fabrics or comparable materials or articles with deformable surfaces, e.g. paper, fabric rolls, stockings, shoes.
Affixing tags.
Details of labelling machines or apparatus.
Manually-controlled or manually-operable label dispensers, e.g. modified for the application of labels to articles.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Apparatus for applying lining or sheathing using tubular layers or sheathings
B29C63/42 and subgroups.
Making of (adhesive) labels provided on carrier webs
Enclosing successive articles in tubular webs/Devices for distending tubes supplied in the flatened state
Adding cards, coupons or other inserts to package contents
Handling thin or filamentary material, e.g. webs
Franking apparatus
Franking apparatus attaching a label on a mailpiece:
Labels or tags as such
Apparatus or processes specially adapted for marking conductors or cables

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Label
slip of paper, card, linen, metal, etc., for attaching to object and indicating its nature, owner, name, destination, etc.

special-meanings.paragraph-text: In patent documents, the following words/expressions are often used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Liner labels (label backing/carrier)
web/liner/strip/sheet

definition-item.definition-title: Labelling flat essentially-rigid surfaces (labelling of fabrics B65C5/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Affixing labels to one flat surface of articles.
Affixing labels, e.g. wrap-around labels, to two or more flat surfaces of a polyhedral article, e.g. cigarette package.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Franking apparatus
Franking apparatus attaching a label on a mailpiece

definition-item.definition-title: Affixing labels to one flat surface of articles, e.g. of packages, of flat bands

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Applying a (one) label to one flat surface of an article.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Affixing labels, e.g. wrap-around labels, to two or more flat surfaces of a polyhedral article

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Applying a (one) label to two or more flat surfaces of a polyhedral article.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Labelling other than flat surfaces (of fabrics B65C5/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Affixing labels to elongated objects, e.g. wires, cables.
Affixing labels to short rigid containers., e.g. bottles.
Affixing labels to non-rigid containers, e.g. bottles made of polyethylene, boxes to be inflated by internal air pressure prior to labelling.

definition-item.definition-title: Affixing labels to elongated objects, e.g. wires, cables, bars, tubes

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Affixing labels to short rigid containers

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Applying a (one) label to a rigid container.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Apparatus or processes specially adapted for marking conductors or cables

definition-item.definition-title: {by placing tubular labels around the container (applying preformed tubular sheathings of plastics in general B29C63/18; applying protective covers to closures B67B5/03)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Apparatus for applying lining or sheathing using tubular layers or sheathings:
Enclosing successive articles in tubular webs/Devices for distending tubes supplied in the flatened state

definition-item.definition-title: Affixing labels to non-rigid containers, e.g. bottles made of polyethylene, boxes to be inflated by internal air pressure prior to labelling

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Applying a label to a non-rigid container or box to be inflated by internal pressure prior, and optionally during, the labelling.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Labelling fabrics or comparable materials or articles with deformable surface, e.g. paper, fabric rolls, stockings, shoes (affixing labels to non-rigid containers B65C3/26; by sewing D05B {; applying marks during shoe manufacture A43D95/14; marking textile materials by attaching tags D06H1/04})

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Using adhesives.
Using staples.

definition-item.definition-title: using adhesives

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: using staples {(man-operated portable stapling tools B25C5/00; permanently attaching together sheets B42B4/00)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Affixing tags (in combination with filling of tea bags B65B29/04 {; multi-step processes for making labels or tags B31D1/02})

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Using pins having at least one sharp pointed end.
Using paddle-shaped plastic pins.

definition-item.definition-title: {using pins having at least one sharp pointed end}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: {using paddle-shaped plastic pins (using plastic pins for affixing buttons to garments A41H37/008)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Using paddle-shaped pins, "plastic" is not an essential limiting feature.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Details of labelling machines or apparatus {(attaching articles to carriers B65B15/00; cards of samples G09F5/04)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Removing backing sheets.
Preparing the labels or articles, e.g. smoothing, removing air bubbles.
Interchangeable modules of a labelling machine, e.g. different label type or
size dispenser modules. Cutting tubular labels from a web.
Devices for moving articles, e.g. containers, past a labelling station.
Devices for presenting articles in predetermined attitude or position at a labelling station.
Label feeding Gluing the labels or articles.
Devices for applying labels.
Label cooling or drying.
Controls; Safety devices.
Applying date marks, code marks, or the like, to the label during labelling.

definition-item.definition-title: {Removing backing sheets}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: {Preparing the labels or articles, e.g. smoothing, removing air bubbles}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Preparing the labels or the articles before or during the application of the label to the article, e.g. drying articles, preheating, electrostatic (de-)charging, stretching of labels, etc.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group:

definition-item.definition-title: {Interchangeable modules, e.g. applicator heads with label magazines and glue rollers}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: {Cutting tubular labels from a web}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Devices for moving articles, e.g. containers, past labelling station

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: having means for rotating the articles

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Having means for rotating the articles themselves, i.e. spinning, independently from their conveying direction, i.e. being on a linear conveyor or on a rotating carousel, during the label application.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Devices for presenting articles in predetermined attitude or position at labelling station

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Devices for positioning articles prior to label application, for example rotating the articles around their own axis prior to label application, or height adjustment of article support means according to article size.

definition-item.definition-title: {for orienting bottles having swing stoppers, i.e. by means responsive to the position of the swing stoppers}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: {for orienting articles having irregularities in their shape, the irregularities being detected by mechanical means}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: {for orienting articles having irregularities, e.g. holes, spots or markings, e.g. labels or imprints, the irregularities or markings being detected}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Label feeding

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
This group comprises the following subgroups:
Label magazines
Removing separate labels from stacks
Label feeding from strips

definition-item.definition-title: Label magazines

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Removing separate labels from stacks (for printing B41F; separating articles from piles in general B65H) ({multi-step processes for making labels or tags B31D1/02}; for printing B41F)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Label feeding from strips, e.g. from rolls

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The labels being cut from a strip.
The labels adhering on a backing strip.
Spools or cassettes for strips.
The labels being torn or burst from a strip.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Gluing the labels or articles

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
By wetting, e.g. by applying liquid glue or a liquid to a dry glue coating

list-item.paragraph-text: Applying the liquid on the label

section-body.paragraph-text: By heat
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Devices for applying labels

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Specific devices for applying labels to articles in general, not necessarily restricted to a specific surfaces, and for which is normally no other entry.
This group comprises the following subgroups:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Manually-controlled or manually-operable label dispensers, e.g. modified for the application of labels to articles (special furniture, fittings, or accessories for shops, storehouses, bars, or the like A47F; for paper napkins, for toilet paper A47K; for playing cards A63F; movable-strip writing or reading apparatus B42D19/00; adhesive tape dispensers B65H35/002; dispensers for tickets G07B; coin-operated dispensers for stamps G07F {; dispensing devices for pamphlets from vehicles G09F21/22})

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Modified for the application of labels to articles.
Using electrical or electro-mechanical means.
Using pneumatic means.
Having printing equipment.
Having means for moistening the labels.
Having means for heating thermo-activatable labels.
This group is directed to manually operated devices, whereas B65C9/08 is directed to machine operated devices.
